description: This Python source file defines utilities and dependencies to support multi-tenancy handling in a FastAPI application. It includes a tenant context model and a dependency function to extract tenant information from request headers.

classes.name: TenantContext
classes.description: Represents the request's tenant context, mainly holding the tenant identifier.

methods.name: TenantContext tenant_dep(x_tenant_id: str = Header(..., alias="X-Tenant-Id"))
methods.description: FastAPI dependency function that extracts the X-Tenant-Id header from incoming requests, validates it, and returns a TenantContext object. Raises an HTTP error if the header is missing or empty.

ctags.name: tenant_id
ctags.pattern: /^    tenant_id: str = Field(..., description="Tenant identifier (from X-Tenant-Id header)")$/
